structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases
Forgery And Crimes Against The Currency

law.catch_line: False Or Forged Note, Certificate Or Other Bill Of Credit Issued For Debt Of Commonwealth
law.text: Whoever, with intent to injure or defraud, falsely makes, alters, forges or counterfeits a note, certificate or other bill of credit issued by the state treasurer, or by any commissioner or other officer authorized to issue the same for a debt of this commonwealth, shall be punished by imprisonment in the state prison for life or for any term of years.
